Salty Palate seafood festival: Hawke’s Bay kaimoana lovers rejoice, because this party’s about to make waves https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/seafood-lovers-rejoice-theres-a-salty-festival-about-to-make-waves-in-hawkes-bay/5UWBIZPMUVFFROHKOZWSFR5XYQ/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/seafood-lovers-rejoice-theres-a-salty-festival-about-to-make-waves-in-hawkes-bay/5UWBIZPMUVFFROHKOZWSFR5XYQ/ Linda HallThis is set to be a seafood experience 'like no other'. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Mark your calendars and get ready to experience Salty Palate - A Seafood Celebration in Hawke's Bay on Saturday, March 30, 2024, from 1 pm to 7 pm at The Old Church.
Animal welfare: Companion Animals NZ to hold conference series in Waikato https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/animal-welfare-companion-animals-nz-to-hold-conference-series-in-waikato/SDUTT4DS25AWDJ5Z745J7HX6YM/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/animal-welfare-companion-animals-nz-to-hold-conference-series-in-waikato/SDUTT4DS25AWDJ5Z745J7HX6YM/ Malisha KumarThe conference will focus on issues that are affecting pet owners worldwide. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 18:00:00 +0000 Professor Nat Waran, from Companion Animals New Zealand, is getting ready to host a week-long series of conferences in the Waikato on the future of animal welfare.
Waipā Creative Trail adds more artists to the mix https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waipa-creative-trail-adds-more-artists-to-the-mix/6V2BFPK2YVCKFCCGBG7XSQC2OI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/waikato-news/news/waipa-creative-trail-adds-more-artists-to-the-mix/6V2BFPK2YVCKFCCGBG7XSQC2OI/ Malisha KumarThe five exhibitions will showcase artwork from more than 60 local artists. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:58:00 +0000 Waipā Creative Trail participant, Jennie De Groot, is opening her studio to the public on the day. She wants people to know that there are artists in the Waipā district, and you don't have to go far. Photo / Waipā Creative team.
Katikati anti-aircraft gun under fire from RSA village residentshttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/katikati-anti-aircraft-gun-under-fire-from-rsa-village-residents/CPG6HE3OKZHGHMADCLCM5ZJOSA/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/bay-of-plenty-times/news/katikati-anti-aircraft-gun-under-fire-from-rsa-village-residents/CPG6HE3OKZHGHMADCLCM5ZJOSA/ Rebecca Mauger'I can’t see how it can be a fitting memorial given those who have died because of it.' Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:57:21 +0000 Beth Beamish thinks the Bofors gun at an RSA village should not be down a "quiet, peaceful" residential road such as Binnie Rd, Katikati.
Intense weather ahead: Autumn storm to sweep New Zealand after cloudy day today https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/intense-weather-ahead-autumn-storm-to-sweep-new-zealand-after-cloudy-day-today/X5YXBPP7SVB6TISJGULKZGFY3U/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/nz/intense-weather-ahead-autumn-storm-to-sweep-new-zealand-after-cloudy-day-today/X5YXBPP7SVB6TISJGULKZGFY3U/ Raphael FranksIn the meantime, Auckland has a forecast high of 23C for Saturday, 24C for Sunday, Monday. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:30:25 +0000 An autumn storm is approaching, and with it comes a dramatic drop in temperatures, heavy rain, gales, big waves and snow. This Niwa weather map shows Monday's forecast. Photo / Niwa
Canny View: It’s not all bad news in the financial worldhttps://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/canny-view-its-not-all-bad-news-in-the-financial-world/A2P6WFV2KVDUZNYCGQQ4LSBVCI/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/canny-view-its-not-all-bad-news-in-the-financial-world/A2P6WFV2KVDUZNYCGQQ4LSBVCI/ Nick StewartIt feels like a flood of bad news at the moment. And yet globally, the data isn’t all bad. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:26:00 +0000 If you back out when markets start going downhill, you risk permanently losing both momentum and money.
Kiwiesque accommodation owners say Hawke’s Bay’s Esk Valley still the ‘perfect place’ to visit https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/eskvalley-still-a-beautiful-place-to-be/RGFXUZPW7RBO7MEGIKOBWK23YY/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/eskvalley-still-a-beautiful-place-to-be/RGFXUZPW7RBO7MEGIKOBWK23YY/ Linda Hall'I think people might have the wrong idea about what’s happening in the valley.' Mark McCutcheon murder in Ongaonga: Hulio Ataria released on parole after 15 years https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/mark-mccutcheon-murder-in-ongaonga-hulio-ataria-released-on-parole-after-15-years/VGQ6PISFZZCAHDXNREF2OEKB2I/ https://www.nzherald.co.nz/hawkes-bay-today/news/mark-mccutcheon-murder-in-ongaonga-hulio-ataria-released-on-parole-after-15-years/VGQ6PISFZZCAHDXNREF2OEKB2I/ Mark McCutcheon was stabbed in the heart, then tried to drive away but crashed. Fri, 01 Mar 2024 17:00:00 +0000 Local farm contractor Mark McCutcheon was murdered by mob prospect Hulio Ataria outside the Sandford Arms Tavern in Central Hawke's Bay in 2009.
